website_summaries.verdict: A concealer that works well on a lot of discolorations, including acne.
pros: Just one layer gives a lot of coverage
Beautifully blends and hides skin discolorations
Lasts all day long without having to reapply
cons: Does a great job of covering most blemishes, but coverage may not be enough for under the eyes and it can sometimes end up highlighting fine lines

customer_reviews.title: Very light coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very light coverage I think tarte has better products look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Evaluna

customer_reviews.title: breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I liked what the product was made of but when i got it and used it twice it broke in the middle and i did not press hard at all. both broke. I have other sticks and i've never had this problem. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and ease of using it. But it’s not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: alma hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought, greasy, not a long lasting 12 hour coverage. And didn't cover well. Color wasn't bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to my skin color!
customer_reviews.text: I put it on any dark spot and it lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Mareee

customer_reviews.title: Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only concealer that holds all day. I’ve used it for years.
customer_reviews.author: JDL1977

customer_reviews.title: I like this concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concealer, it’s thick and stay pretty good if you use a transparent powder with it. I use a little brush to apply it. It really covers blemishes well. They used to have it in the store, but discontinued it so I’m having to get it on line.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this purchase but it didnt live up to the hype. It is good at first but tend to wear off and when using it with eyeshadow (as base) it turns the eyshadow color to a diffrent shade
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: LUV♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: Works Great & perfect match 4 my skin tone. Totally Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover up! It dies the trick! My only bummer is that if I close it without rolling it back down it breaks if it sticks to the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: ... brow box in honeypot and I am absolutely IN LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with urban decay brow box in honeypot and I am absolutely IN LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ott

product_meta.title: Tarte Amazonian clay 12-hour waterproof concealer Light-Medium Honey
product_meta.description: A waterproof concealer powered by Amazonian clay, nature's most perfect ingredient, to balance and soothe skin. This waterproof, full-coverage concealer combines the calming properties of vitamins A and E and the soothing quality of Amazonian clay to nourish while completely masking discolorations and imperfections for better looking skin. Amazonian clay acts as a total skin balancer by reducing dryness and flakiness while improving the appearance and texture of skin for longer, waterproof wear! The buildable full-coverage formula is rich in pigments for truer color without a heavy or tacky texture, making it ideal for hiding any and all imperfections from dark circles to blemishes to redness. Designed for brush-free application, blending this creamy concealer with your finger allows the formula to melt into the skin for an easy application and opaque airbrushed effect. It is formulated Without: - Parabens- Synthetic Fragrances- Synthetic Dyes- Phthalates Skinvigorating(TM) benefits come from: Amazonian clay, a nutrient-rich, multitasking and total-skin-balancing clay that reduces dryness and flakiness, improves skin clarity, elasticity, firmness, and texture while removing oil from the skin's surface for smooth application and wear; Vitamin E, a natural preservative that also acts as an anti-inflammatory emollient and protects against free radical damage; and mineral pigments known to soothe and soften the skin.
